title: Recycling Spent Batteries to Green Innovation: Cu/Co Composites as Electrocatalysts for CO2 Reduction

The reuse of solid and gaseous waste is necessary to achieve a significant advance toward more sustainable and eco-friendly processes. It is a challenge in the electronic industry, where the...
